name: Microsoft PowerPoint

files.installer: N/A:Please select the setup.exe located on the installation DVD.

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the setup.exe located on the installation DVD.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Office/Office14/MSPUB.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running setup
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
